thread.title: Here is your Friday night HS football rundown
thread.title_full: Here is your Friday night HS football rundown

title: Here is your Friday night HS football rundown
text:
Here is your Friday night HS football rundown Game of the Week: Xavier Prep @ Coachella Valley Patrick Edgell , Digital Content Director, patrick.edgell@kesq.com POSTED: 12:41 PM PDT Oct 16, 2015 UPDATED: 12:44 PM PDT Oct 16, 2015 MGN Online THOUSAND PALMS, Calif. - 
It's Week 7 of the high school football season in the Coachella Valley, and The Best Local Sports Show (#BLSS) will have all of the action on KESQ News Channel 3 and 11PM. Related Content 
Be sure to check back around that same time to check out our top highlights and vote for the Play of the Week. 
*Game of the Week* 
Palm Valley @ Desert Christian Academy 
Cornerstone Christian @ Desert Chapel 
West Shores @ St. Joseph Academy 
Saturday Game 
Bye Week 
Indio and Desert Hot Springs 
We'll have all the scores and highlights for you at 11 p.m. on The Best Local Sports Show.
